text: (napiye!) Nam um mukam atikkati vanattai nokkak kankirom. Enave nir virumpum kiplavin pakkam um'mait titamaka tiruppi vitukirom;. Akave nir ippolutu (makkavin) masjitul haram pakkam um mukattait tiruppik kollum. (Muslimkale!) Innum ninkal enkiruntalum (tolukaiyin potu) unkal mukankalai anta (kiplavin) pakkame tiruppit kollunkal;. Niccayamaka evarkal vetam kotukkappattirukkinrarkalo avarkal, itu avarkalutaiya iraivanitamiruntu vanta unmai enpatai niccayamaka arivarkal; allah avarkal ceyvatu parrip paramukamaka illai
